name: google-reviews-business-data
title: Google Reviews & Business Data API
description: Extract Google Business reviews, ratings, response rates, photos, and business details for any location. Supports review sorting, rating distribution, owner response tracking, and business search by category + location.

business.description: Per business lookup with full details

endpoints.description: Fetch Google reviews for a business by Place ID

params.place_id: Google Place ID (required, in URL path)

endpoints.description: Get detailed business info + review summary

params.place_id: Google Place ID (required, in URL path)
Google Place ID (required, in URL path)

features: Individual review extraction (author, rating, text, date, likes, owner response)
Business details (name, address, phone, hours, category, photos, coordinates)
Mobile proxy for authentic Google data
